Posted By: UndeadDR (2/7/2011 4:01:02 PM)

posts.post_content:
[Etched Champion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Etched Champion) equipped with [Darksteel Plate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Darksteel Plate) and [Darksteel Axe](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Darksteel Axe)  
  
There's virtually no card in all of M:tG that can deal with the champion directly at that point. You have to get rid of at least one piece of equipment first. Granted, there's a plethora of ways to do that. Still...  
  
EDIT:  
  
*@PhyrexianAdvocate say that to Apocalypse* --Szentekkel  
  
That's why I said virtually. :) [Apocalypse](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Apocalypse) and [Mutilate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mutilate) both get the job done, staying in set you get [Black Sun's Zenith](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Black Sun's Zenith).
posts.html:
Etched Champion equipped with Darksteel Plate and Darksteel Axe

There's virtually no card in all of M:tG that can deal with the champion directly at that point. You have to get rid of at least one piece of equipment first. Granted, there's a plethora of ways to do that. Still...

EDIT:

That's why I said virtually. :) Apocalypse and Mutilate both get the job done, staying in set you get Black Sun's Zenith.

This might be a fun equipment to shift around with a Brass Squire.

Really seems like this or the Silverskin Armor should have also prevented -1/-1 counters. Maybe the Neurok will finally figure it out for the next set.

@Phyrexian Advocate: Brittle Effigy which is already in some decks and sideboards and may become more common if people play Blightsteel Colossus much. He could also be pinned down by Tumble Magnet or Icy Manipulator. Any artifact creature with Infect could also still slay him.

posts.post_content:
indestructibility used to be so much more, you can see how thats changed from here now (scars) compared to old mirrodin just by looking at the cost, -looking @ how much more expensive it was back then, its because it used to mean something  
  
not that it doesn't now, but just not as much (due to accesibilty of exiling cards like [revoke existence](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=revoke existence), and infect particularly in this set)
